title: 权限组没有交互权限
author: 阿舫
txt_content:
我创建了一个CK和QS的权限组

 他们2个都是继承了default的权限


 但是CK权限组能交互，QS却不能，这是为什么呢？
同样继承的Default默认权限组....
我也尝试QS继承Builder组，还是没交互权限.


 groups:
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&4'
      suffix: ''
  QS:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&f[&e骑士&f]&2'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - scriptblock.walk.use
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: ''
  CK:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance: []
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&f[&6刺客&f]&2'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c'
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - scriptblock.walk.use
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&e'
      suffix: ''

【管教】03 2018-7-11 13:36:45

replies.author: 阿舫
replies.txt_content:
诺尘_ 发表于 2018-7-11 14:31
/mangaddp QS essentials.use
/mangaddp QS essentials.build
原谅我太笨.......我tm每次都是/mangaddp QS essentials*.use
